"A.P.239/5/3":
"Oh, it's you!
I'm glad you're doing fine."
"Don't let your guard down. After all, that [Profound Darkness] thing is somewhere out there."
"We're coming up with a plan to push it back, but we need you... and Predecessor to do the manual labor."
"As Huey always says \"... Your body needs care, so eat well and rest well.\""
"You and Predecessor are too extreme on your bodies; I hope that both of you at least rest."

"It's just you right now, right?
Predecessor isn't with you right now, right?"
"... Ok, excellent. I've wanted to ask..."
"You and Predecessor, Matoi, you two are close, right?"

"Therefore, please tell me.
What kind of gift would please her if she was handed one?"
"There's things I want to know about her, but I can't talk to her like you can."
"So when I was talking to her, the idea of giving her a present came to mind."
"Besides, I've wanted to celebrate her coming back safely... too..."
"2. What would you like to be gifted?"

"You're right.
Well, I wonder what I should give her."
"Maybe I should give her something that I would like. Hmm, yes..."

"Something I want...?
I see, right... Something I'd want..."

"...Yeah.
I think I understand. I knew asking you was a good idea."
